trans-unit.target: Expõe tipos <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem" /> à Automação de Interface do Usuário.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GroupItemAutomationPeer" />.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GroupItemAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GroupItemAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GroupItemAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de controle para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GroupItemAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of child elements of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GroupItemAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de elementos filho do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GroupItemAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GroupItemAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GroupItemAutomationPeer" />.
Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém "GroupItem".

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GroupItemAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o padrão de controle do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GroupItemAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="pattern" /> is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse" /> and the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GroupItemAutomationPeer" /> contains an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Expander" />, this method returns a reference to the current instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GroupItemAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Se <paramref name="pattern" /> for <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ExpandCollapse" /> e o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GroupItem" /> que está associado a esse <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GroupItemAutomationPeer" /> contiver um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Expander" />, esse método retornará uma referência à instância atual do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GroupItemAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this method calls the base implementation on <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> which returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, esse método chamará a implementação base em <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer" /> que retorna <see langword="null" />.
